notification.alert: How a CVS drugstore in D.C. became a symbol of America's shoplifting panic

alert.body: How a CVS drugstore in D.C. became a symbol of America's shoplifting panic
alert.title: Editors' Picks

custom.text: It became a horror story of Late Capitalism. Tales were told on social media, and in the comments sections of local news stories, and they were full of spooky scenes (harsh fluorescent lights shining on bare shelves!) and jump scares (hordes of teenagers reportedly ransacking the stores!).

notification.alert: An examination of Robert F. Kennedy’s early years as a lawyer reveals a controversy long before he trained his sights on vaccines

alert.body: An examination of Robert F. Kennedy’s early years as a lawyer reveals a controversy long before he trained his sights on vaccines
alert.title: Politics Alert

custom.text: As a young attorney at Riverkeeper, Kennedy Jr. opened a schism by hiring a new staff scientist just released from federal prison. His crime: running an international wildlife smuggling ring that prosecutors said had damaged rare bird populations.

notification.alert: University of Maryland halts all fraternity, sorority events amid hazing concerns

alert.body: University of Maryland halts all fraternity, sorority events amid hazing concerns
alert.title: D.C. Region

custom.text: The University of Maryland has suspended all “new member” fraternity and sorority events and any events with alcohol while officials look into hazing allegations.

notification.alert: The ‘greenest’ car in America might surprise you. Hint: It’s not an EV.

alert.body: The ‘greenest’ car in America might surprise you. Hint: It’s not an EV.
alert.title: Editors' Picks

custom.text: A new analysis finds that the greenest car in America this year isn’t an electric vehicle — it’s the Toyota Prius Prime, a plug-in hybrid that can go 44 miles on all-electric power. The result shows that size and efficiency, not just drivetrain, matter when buying a new car.

notification.alert: U.S. military airdrops aid into Gaza as relief agencies warn of mass starvation

alert.body: U.S. military airdrops aid into Gaza as relief agencies warn of mass starvation
alert.title: Breaking News

custom.text: Three U.S. officials confirmed Saturday that the airdrops were carried out by C-130 cargo plane. The operation followed similar moves from countries including Egypt, France, Jordan and the United Arab Emirates.

notification.alert: Iris Apfel has died at 102. The designer, known for her oversized, owlish spectacles, became a ‘geriatric starlet’ in her 80s.

alert.body: Iris Apfel has died at 102. The designer, known for her oversized, owlish spectacles, became a ‘geriatric starlet’ in her 80s.
alert.title: Entertainment Alert

custom.text: Apfel, who died at her home in Palm Beach, Fla., appeared regularly in the style pages of the New York Times and starred in advertising campaigns for Kate Spade and Coach handbags. Stu Loeser, a spokesman for her estate, confirmed her death in a statement but did not provide a specific cause.

notification.alert: U.S. to launch airdrop campaign over Gaza, Biden says, as humanitarian crisis worsens

alert.body: U.S. to launch airdrop campaign over Gaza, Biden says, as humanitarian crisis worsens
alert.title: World Alert

custom.text: The announcement comes with Gaza on the brink of famine, humanitarian groups say. Aid convoys have struggled to make deliveries amid Israel’s bombardment of the Palestinian enclave and disruptions at border crossings.

notification.alert: Final arguments are underway on whether Fani Willis should be disqualified from case against Trump. Follow our live coverage.

alert.body: Final arguments are underway on whether Fani Willis should be disqualified from case against Trump. Follow our live coverage.
alert.title: Politics Alert

custom.text: Defense attorneys and prosecutors in the election interference case against former president Donald Trump and his allies are scheduled to make their final arguments this afternoon on whether Fulton County District Attorney Fani T. Willis (D) and her office should be disqualified from the case. Fulton County Superior Court Judge Scott McAfee has suggested that he does not plan to rule from the bench today, and he has not provided a timeline for his decision. The misconduct allegations threaten to derail the criminal case against Trump, one of four he faces as he again runs for president.

notification.alert: Over 100 convicted Jan. 6 rioters could be resentenced after appeals court ruling

alert.body: Over 100 convicted Jan. 6 rioters could be resentenced after appeals court ruling
alert.title: Breaking News

custom.text: The U.S. Court of Appeals for the D.C. Circuit overturned the use of a sentencing enhancement applied to a Jan. 6 defendant who stormed the U.S. Capitol and was convicted of felony obstruction. The court, however, upheld the use of the obstruction charge that is being challenged by Capitol attack defendants and is also being lodged against former president Donald Trump and will soon be debated by the Supreme Court.

notification.alert: Walgreens, CVS will soon dispense abortion pill in states where it is legal, expanding access ahead of expected Supreme Court case

alert.body: Walgreens, CVS will soon dispense abortion pill in states where it is legal, expanding access ahead of expected Supreme Court case
alert.title: U.S. Alert

custom.text: The move by two of the nation’s largest pharmacy networks promises to increase the availability of mifepristone as soon as next week.

notification.alert: Senate passes short-term extension to avert partial government shutdown, sending it to Biden to sign before weekend deadline

alert.body: Senate passes short-term extension to avert partial government shutdown, sending it to Biden to sign before weekend deadline
alert.title: Breaking News

custom.text: The new shutdown deadlines will be March 8 and March 22. The House had passed the bill Thursday.

notification.alert: The palace says Catherine, Princess of Wales, is recovering from a surgery. So why the absurd conspiracy theories?

alert.body: The palace says Catherine, Princess of Wales, is recovering from a surgery. So why the absurd conspiracy theories?
alert.title: World Alert

custom.text: Catherine had a planned abdominal surgery in January, and Kensington Palace said from the outset that she wouldn’t be resuming public appearances until after Easter. But perhaps partly because she has so often been the picture of health and fitness, her absence has stirred speculation.

notification.alert: Trump sweeps GOP primary contests in Michigan, Idaho and Missouri, AP projects, bringing him closer to clinching nomination

alert.body: Trump sweeps GOP primary contests in Michigan, Idaho and Missouri, AP projects, bringing him closer to clinching nomination
alert.title: Breaking News

custom.text: Donald Trump won all three nominating contests Saturday, the Associated Press projected, putting him in a stronger position for March 5, the day 15 states and a third of delegates are awarded as part of Super Tuesday. Nikki Haley, Trump’s main rival for the GOP nod, has vowed to press on until then, despite losing every primary and caucus so far.

notification.alert: Offensive comments by N.C. Republican gubernatorial hopeful Mark Robinson stand out, even in Trump’s party

alert.body: Offensive comments by N.C. Republican gubernatorial hopeful Mark Robinson stand out, even in Trump’s party
alert.title: Editors' Picks

custom.text: Robinson is favored to advance to a November showdown against Democratic Attorney General Josh Stein, who has a much more measured tone — setting up a clash that echoes the choice between former president Donald Trump and President Biden. To many Republicans, Robinson is a conservative Christian firebrand with Trump-like appeal. To others, he is a glaring liability in a battleground race.

notification.alert: Relisha Rudd was 8 when a janitor at a homeless shelter befriended her, then took her. A decade later, she haunts a changed city.

alert.body: Relisha Rudd was 8 when a janitor at a homeless shelter befriended her, then took her. A decade later, she haunts a changed city.
alert.title: D.C. Region

custom.text: Nearly three weeks passed before D.C. authorities realized she was missing. She still has not been found. Her disappearance forced a reckoning in how the city treats its poorest and most vulnerable residents.

notification.alert: Iowa star Caitlin Clark passes Pete Maravich to become the all-time NCAA Division I basketball scoring leader

alert.body: Iowa star Caitlin Clark passes Pete Maravich to become the all-time NCAA Division I basketball scoring leader
alert.title: Breaking News

custom.text: Clark, whose No. 6 Iowa Hawkeyes faced No. 2 Ohio State on Sunday, needed 18 points to surpass Maravich for the record. Last week, the senior guard broke a pre-NCAA scoring record set by Lynette Woodard for women’s major college basketball and announced her intention to enter the 2024 WNBA draft, where she's widely expected to be the No. 1 overall pick.

notification.alert: Israel’s restrictions on Gaza aid put the enclave on the brink of famine

alert.body: Israel’s restrictions on Gaza aid put the enclave on the brink of famine
alert.title: Editors' Picks

custom.text: Thursday’s aid convoy tragedy highlighted the ongoing obstacles to delivering aid to war-battered Gaza. Humanitarian officials say Israel’s limiting of entry points for aid, its onerous inspection process, and its military’s attacks on aid convoys and the police who guarded them have produced a “manmade” hunger crisis.

notification.alert: Haley pulls off her first 2024 GOP win in D.C., AP projects. Trump is still heavily favored to clinch the nomination.

alert.body: Haley pulls off her first 2024 GOP win in D.C., AP projects. Trump is still heavily favored to clinch the nomination.
alert.title: Breaking News

custom.text: Nikki Haley beat Donald Trump in the nation’s capital, the Associated Press reported. But only 19 delegates were at stake, so her campaign still significantly lags as the race heads to what could be a decisive Super Tuesday on March 5, when 15 states and a third of delegates are awarded.

custom.text: JetBlue had sought to acquire Spirit Airlines, but a judge had blocked the deal after the Justice Department sued to stop it on grounds that it would stifle competition and reduce options for fliers.

notification.alert: Supreme Court rules Trump can remain on primary ballots, ending a bid to disqualify him over his role in the Jan. 6 riot

alert.body: Supreme Court rules Trump can remain on primary ballots, ending a bid to disqualify him over his role in the Jan. 6 riot
alert.title: Breaking News

custom.text: The decision resolves a lawsuit filed by Colorado voters who argued that the Constitution bars Donald Trump from holding office because his actions surrounding the Jan. 6, 2021, attack on the Capitol amounted to insurrection.

notification.alert: Former Trump Organization financial officer Allen Weisselberg pleads guilty to perjury charges

alert.body: Former Trump Organization financial officer Allen Weisselberg pleads guilty to perjury charges
alert.title: U.S. Alert

custom.text: The perjury charges mark the latest legal peril for Allen Weisselberg, who in recent years pleaded guilty to multiple felonies, including grand larceny and criminal tax fraud; served months behind bars; and was penalized $1 million in a civil fraud trial.

notification.alert: France becomes first country to explicitly enshrine abortion rights in its constitution — a response to U.S. restrictions

alert.body: France becomes first country to explicitly enshrine abortion rights in its constitution — a response to U.S. restrictions
alert.title: Breaking News

custom.text: French lawmakers meeting in a special session at Versailles voted to add abortion to the constitution as a “guaranteed freedom.” Activists and politicians have been transparent that this is a response to the U.S. Supreme Court ruling that abortion protections are not inferred from the Constitution.

notification.alert: A lifelong gun owner wondered how he'd react if an intruder ever broke in. Then he found out.

alert.body: A lifelong gun owner wondered how he'd react if an intruder ever broke in. Then he found out.
alert.title: Opinion

custom.text: I never sleep with a gun under my pillow. But one night not long ago, I wished I had.
